Dennis Schneider

Ruby & Rails Developer // Indie Game Developer // Nihilist

If you’re going to evolve and grow as a creative person, you’re going to make mistakes.

15 Mar 2011

If you’re going to evolve and grow as a creative person, you’re going to make mistakes. In fact, you should start making twice as many mistakes as soon as possible if you want to have an innovative breakthrough.

[Lateral Action](http://lateralaction.com/articles/tyler-durden-innovation/)
